de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine.simple

Class DefaultClientStateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine.AbstractStateHelper<TnccContentHandler>
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine.simple.DefaultClientStateHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateHelper<TnccContentHandler>

    public class DefaultClientStateHelper
extends AbstractStateHelper<TnccContentHandler>
    Default TNCC state helper to make information and commonly used functions accessible to a TNCC state.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultClientStateHelper(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed attributes, TnccContentHandler contentHandler)
      Creates a default TNCC state helper with the given session and/or connection attributes, which should be accessible by a state and a TNCC content handler, that provides message handling functions.
